description: Allows the user to create doors on any surface, including the air itself, and pass through them to different locations or dimensions.

users.circumstances: Blueno ate the fruit at an unknown time before joining CP9

abilityReveals.description: Blueno uses his Devil Fruit power to create doors to restrain and capture opponents, as demonstrated when capturing Franky and his followers.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Blueno assists Rob Lucci in capturing Franky by restraining the Franky Family members who try to intervene.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: The ability to create doors anywhere provides extreme versatility for infiltration, escape, and combat.
